mapper.insert: insert into store_tb ( store_id, store_name, address, business_number, owner_name, store_phone, created_at, updated_at, user_id ) values( default, ${storeName}, ${address}, ${businessNumber}, ${ownerName}, ${storePhone}, now(), now(), ${userId} )
mapper.update: update store_application_tb set status = ${status}, reviewed_at = ${reviewedAt}, reject_reason = ${rejectReason}, updated_at = now() where store_application_id = ${storeApplicationId}
mapper.select: select * from store_application_tb where store_application_id = ${storeApplicationId} and user_id = ${userId}
